author: 6 News Staff reports
title: 1982 cold case homicide cleared in Council Bluffs
description: The killer was later murdered too
content:
COUNCIL BLUFFS, IOWA (WOWT) - Council Bluffs police say they have cleared the 1982 homicide of a 32-year-old woman.
The victim, Lee Rotatori, had just moved from Nunica, Michigan, and started a job â€¦ [+2046 chars]
